channel.title: Reporting a server! ANY MODERATOR OF FORUM LOOK! OR ADMIN!
channel.description:
I was on the server status page and checked out the servers. Then i found texas.hopto.org http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=72.37.185.132 <---- thats the link to info about it.!
I liked it so i went on it and when i logged in I got this message at chat box: (see pic i marked the message)
[IMG]http://i242.photobucket.com/albums/ff126/moparscape_geek/reportedthisscammer.jpg[/img]
Well its not aloud to sell mod/admin spots for rs2 cash. So its not to sell for normal cash either!!!
Report. I hope it get banned.!
Bloop. [size=15pt]And i know this is wrong section. But here people will notice it!!![/size]

item.title: Reporting a server! ANY MODERATOR OF FORUM LOOK! OR ADMIN!

@bloop wrote:

Iv done that for long time ago… + here people can see it so the admins can take care of it. They dont answer the messages at the advertisement…

Read full topic
